thought.text: Let me try to convert the Excel file to CSV first:

data.command: python -c "import pandas as pd; pd.read_excel('stock.xlsx').to_csv('stock.csv', index=False); print('Converted to CSV')"

function.arguments: {"command":"python -c \"import pandas as pd; pd.read_excel('stock.xlsx').to_csv('stock.csv', index=False); print('Converted to CSV')\""}
function.name: terminal_run_command
